title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4067.1 - Occupational license required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4067.1 - Occupational license required

State Regulations

No person shall participate in or at any steeplechase
race meeting as a jockey, including as a professional or an amateur rider, unless such person has received an occupational steeplechase jockey license
from the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4067.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/16/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
